scripts.say: A few days later - At the gymnasium
While everyone was training hard for the basketball tournament, something rather unusual happened: Cleveland arrived late.
Phew... Sorry, guys! I had some business I had to take care of! â€” Oh, water? Thanks, Commander!
*Glug*... *Gug*... Ahhh! Just what I needed! Okay, okay, I'm late because I was just about done with my shift and...

... And I was like, "What?! San Diego's responsible for a forest of wheat growing in the lawn behind the dorm?" ... But, like, what's wrong with that? Why don't they get you can make food with the wheat...
And they're tellin' me, "If we just leave the wheat, the Fletchers are gonna play around in there.." But, like, there's not enough room for nearly 180 people back there; they like to play together...

Then they're all like, "Well the trees you gave away have been buried under all the wheat!" Well, I gave them away, so I don't really mind! But NOW they're all goin' on about these trees and trying to guilt me into caring about them and stuff...
But I, like, gotta go, you know, so I just said, "Okay, fine! I've got stuff to do, so we'll just have to harvest all that wheat super quickly! And stop calling me Clevebro!..."
In short, some of the girls from the Eagle Union dorm asked me to help... I'm really sorry I wasn't on time!
Cleveland apologized a few times before she settled down. She's been a part of my fleet for a long time, so I'd gotten pretty used to her doing that.
Let's get straight to the training! ... Actually, just a sec... Heeey! Guuuys! I brought some lunch boxes Helena put together! Let's eat later once we're done!
Thanks, sis! I owe you one!
Oh, sis, when will you learn? Helena's are great, don't get me wrong, but sometimes you just wanna eat one of Cleveland's lunches. Y'know what I mean, Commander?
H-huh, really? Then maybe I'll ask Helena about it next time... But only because you said you want it, Commander!
